collections.title: White Noise Machines
collections.description: Mask distracting sounds and create a consistent, soothing audio environment. Our collection of white noise and sound machines helps you fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer.

collections.title: Blackout Curtains
collections.description: Create the perfect, dark sanctuary for sleep. Our collection of blackout curtains is designed to block external light, reduce noise, and insulate your room for optimal rest.

collections.title: Sleep Masks
collections.description: Achieve total darkness for uninterrupted, deeper sleep. Our collection of sleep masks is curated for maximum comfort and light-blocking effectiveness.

collections.title: Pillow & Sleep Sprays
collections.description: Discover our complete collection of sleep sprays, expertly blended to calm the mind and create a serene atmosphere conducive to deep, restorative sleep.

collections.title: Smart Sound Machines (App-Controlled)
collections.description: Take control of your sound environment. Our smart sound machines connect to your phone via an app, allowing you to control the sound, volume, and set timers remotely.

collections.title: Portable & Travel Sound Machines
collections.description: Ensure a good night's sleep wherever you are. Our compact and rechargeable portable sound machines are perfect for travel, the office, or for babies in their pram.

collections.title: White Noise Machines for Babies
collections.description: Help your baby fall asleep and stay asleep by mimicking the soothing sounds of the womb. Our baby sound machines are a must-have for any nursery.

collections.title: White Noise Machines for Adults
collections.description: Mask distracting noises and calm a racing mind. Our white noise machines for adults feature a range of soothing sounds, from pure white noise to gentle nature scapes.

collections.title: Travel Blackout Blinds
collections.description: Turn any room into a dark sleep space. Our portable travel blackout blinds use suction cups to temporarily attach to any window, perfect for holidays and visiting family.

collections.title: Children's & Nursery Blackout Curtains
collections.description: Essential for nap times. Our children's blackout curtains come in a range of soft colours and gentle patterns to create a dark, soothing environment for your little one's sleep.

collections.title: Blackout Roller Blinds
collections.description: A sleek, minimalist solution for total darkness. Our blackout roller blinds fit snugly within your window frame to eliminate light leakage for perfect daytime sleep or movie nights.

collections.title: Thermal Blackout Curtains
collections.description: Block light, insulate your room, and reduce noise. Our thermal blackout curtains are a triple-threat for creating the ultimate sleep environment, keeping your room dark and comfortable.

collections.title: Travel Sleep Masks
collections.description: An essential for any journey. Our travel sleep masks are lightweight, compact, and come with a convenient pouch to ensure you can find rest on planes, trains, and in hotels.

collections.title: Blackout & Contoured Masks
collections.description: For 100% darkness. Our contoured sleep masks are designed with hollow eye cups that block all light without putting any pressure on your eyelids, protecting your lashes.

collections.title: Weighted Sleep Masks
collections.description: Gentle, calming pressure for your eyes. Our weighted sleep masks use microbeads to provide gentle pressure that can help relieve tension and deepen relaxation.

collections.title: Silk Sleep Masks
collections.description: Indulge in the ultimate sleep luxury. Our 100% mulberry silk sleep masks are incredibly soft on your skin, block out light, and help prevent sleep creases.

collections.title: Pillow Mists
collections.description: A nightly ritual for tranquility. Our specially formulated pillow mists are designed to be sprayed directly onto your pillow to envelop you in a calming aroma as you sleep.

collections.title: Eucalyptus & Mint Sprays
collections.description: Refresh your space and clear your mind with our invigorating eucalyptus and mint sprays. Ideal for creating a clean, calming environment conducive to restful breathing.

collections.title: Chamomile Sleep Sprays
collections.description: Gently drift off with the soft, comforting scent of chamomile. Our chamomile sleep sprays are perfect for creating a serene and tranquil atmosphere in your bedroom.

collections.title: Room & Linen Sprays
collections.description: Transform your entire bedroom into a sanctuary for sleep. Our versatile room and linen sprays can be used on bedding, curtains, and in the air to create a lasting sense of calm.

collections.title: Travel-Size Sleep Sprays
collections.description: Take tranquility with you. Our travel-size sleep sprays are perfectly sized for your luggage, helping you create a familiar sense of calm and routine wherever you go.

collections.title: Lavender Sleep Sprays
collections.description: Unwind and prepare for deep rest with our calming lavender sleep sprays. Made with natural essential oils to help soothe the mind and promote a peaceful night's sleep.

collections.title: Weighted Blankets
collections.description: Embrace the feeling of a gentle, comforting hug. Our curated collection of weighted blankets uses deep pressure stimulation to help calm the nervous system, reduce anxiety, and promote deeper, more restorative sleep. Explore our range by user, weight, or feature to find your perfect match.

collections.title: Pillows
collections.description: The right pillow is the foundation of a good night's sleep. Our curated collection of pillows is designed to provide optimal support for your head and neck, promoting proper spinal alignment and relieving pressure. Explore our range to find the perfect pillow for your unique sleeping style and comfort preferences.

collections.title: Sleep Environment
collections.description: Your environment is the foundation of a good night's sleep. This curated collection features all the essentials you need to master your surroundings. Take control of light, sound, and scent to transform your bedroom into the perfect, peaceful sanctuary for deep and uninterrupted rest.

collections.title: Relaxation Aids for Sleep
collections.description: Struggle to switch off your mind at night? This collection is dedicated to calming a racing mind and soothing the body to ease the transition into sleep. Discover our natural, sensory-based solutions for reducing stress and anxiety, and find your path to a tranquil night.

collections.title: Tools for Deeper Sleep
collections.description: Waking up tired is often a sign of poor sleep quality. This collection features our most effective tools for achieving deeper, more restorative, and uninterrupted sleep. Block out disruptions and support your body's natural sleep cycle to wake up feeling truly refreshed and energised.
